tool_description:
Track the status for parcels/shipments of over 1000+ carriers worldwide and also detect what the courier is, based on the tracking code/number.

We can also notify you via Whatsapp for any change of status on your shipments.

A free plan is available.

--

Rastreie o status de encomendas/remessas de mais de 1.000 transportadoras em todo o mundo e também detecte qual é a transportadora, com base no código/número de rastreamento.

Também podemos notificá-lo via Whatsapp sobre qualquer mudança d...
name: Cheap Tracking Status
title: Cheap Tracking Status

api_list.name: GetTrackingDetails
api_list.description:
The courier will be automatically detected, so the only parameter needed is the tracking code.

For all plans, the possible statuses are:

- **INFO RECEIVED**: The sender has just created the label
- **IN TRANSIT**: The parcel is in transit
- **READY FOR DELIVERY OR PICKUP**: It can also mean that the courier has tried to deliver but couldn't and will attempt a redelivery
- **DELIVERED**
- **UNDELIVERED**: It means that the courier struggled to deliver and may be sending the parcel back to the sender
- **NOT FOUND**: Either the courier hasn't updated the information on their system or there is no data available
- **TRY AGAIN LATER**: server may be busy
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cheap-tracking-status.p.rapidapi.com/GetTrackingDetails"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cheap-tracking-status.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: ShipmentNotification
api_list.description:
If a shipment changes its status, we can send you a Whatsapp Message.

For the input **notifyIf**:
- Leave it blank and you'll get notified if the shipment has any change on its status (UNDER DEVELOPMENT)
- Pass in any of the below statuses and and you'll only get notified if the status gets changed to the desired one

**DELIVERED**
**IN TRANSIT**
**READY FOR DELIVERY OR PICKUP**
**UNDELIVERED**
**NOT FOUND**

api_list.name: DetectCourier
api_list.description: The courier description will be given back based on the tracking code.
